Get Taiwan's stock info in real-time

## Install:

```
pip install tw-stock
```
## Example:

```
from tw_stock.stock import get_realtime
print(get_realtime(2330))
```
## Return:

```
{
    "now_amount": "9355",
    "now_diff": "0.0",
    "now_price": "233.00",
    "now_percent": "0.0",
    "stock_name": "台積電",
    "stock_no": "2330"
}
```
